data.comment: The match is underway at Audi Field.
The match is underway at Audi Field.
Miami have a goal kick.
In Washington, D.C. Miami attack through Robbie Robinson. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Washington.
Goal! Rodolfo Pizarro gives Miami a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Lewis Morgan to set up the goal.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a Washington throw-in in Miami's half.
Washington to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Free kick for Miami in the half of Washington.
Victor Ulloa (Miami) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Washington push upfield but Rubiel Vazquez quickly pulls them for offside.
Goal kick for Washington at Audi Field.
Miami are coming forward and Victor Ulloa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Washington goal kick.
Corner awarded to Washington.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Washington, D.C. To check on Ola Kamara, who is grimacing with pain.
Rubiel Vazquez awards Miami a goal kick.
Throw-in for Washington at Audi Field.
Rubiel Vazquez awards Washington a goal kick.
The home team has substituted Ola Kamara with Erik Sorga. Ben Olsen is thus making his first change.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rubiel Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Washington get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Miami have a goal kick.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Free kick for Washington in their own half.
Free kick Washington.
Yamil Asad gets his shot on target but fails to score for Washington.
Throw-in for Washington in the half of Miami.
Washington have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Miami drives forward and Victor Ulloa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Washington get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Throw-in for Washington close to the penalty box.
Washington pushes forward through Felipe Martins, whose finish on goal is saved.
Washington have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Free kick Miami.
Washington needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
Miami's Robbie Robinson breaks free at Audi Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Victor Ulloa for Miami gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Washington at Audi Field.
Free kick for Washington in the half of Miami.
Edison Flores of Washington smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Washington will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Miami.
Junior Moreno (Washington) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Washington's half?
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Washington in their own half.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Washington in their own half.
Joseph Mora for Washington is back on the field again.
Corner awarded to Washington.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Miami.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The match at Audi Field has been interrupted briefly for a check on Joseph Mora, who is down injured.
Rubiel Vazquez waits before resuming play because Robbie Robinson for Miami is still down.
Ben Olsen (Washington) has taken off Joseph Mora who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Oniel Fisher is the replacement.
Juan Agudelo (Miami) has replaced the possibly injured Robbie Robinson.
The second-half is underway at Audi Field.
Throw-in Washington.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Washington.
Washington's Edison Flores gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Miami defender.
Washington's Edison Flores is on target but unsuccessful.
Washington have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Roman Torres (Miami) is red-carded and dismissed.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Washington.
Corner awarded to Washington.
Penalty! Rubiel Vazquez points to the spot, great chance for Washington...
Yamil Asad equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
Washington take a 2-1 lead thanks to Frederic Brillant.
Miami's Wil Trapp has been booked in Washington, D.C..
Free kick for Miami in the half of Washington.
Washington are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Lewis Morgan (Miami) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Miami's Lewis Morgan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Washington goal kick.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Washington.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Washington awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Miami.
Ball safe as Washington is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Washington.
Ben Olsen is making the team's third substitution at Audi Field with Chris Odoi-Atsem replacing Yamil Asad.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Miami.
